sentences.sContent: A new battleship was launched from a shipyard.
sentences.sContent_eng: A new battleship was launched from a shipyard.
sentences.sCn: 一艘新战舰从船坞下水。

sentences.sContent: The new battleship shall be armed with 16-inch guns.
sentences.sContent_eng: The new battleship shall be armed with 16-inch guns.
sentences.sCn: 新战舰将以16英寸口径的大炮武装起来。

trans.tranOther: the largest type of ship used in war, with very big guns and heavy  armour
